title: 5 Tips for Managing Anxiety
description: Learn practical strategies like mindfulness and grounding techniques to reduce anxiety and improve mental well-being.
author: AMH Team

title: How to Support a Loved One
description: Discover ways to be there for someone struggling with mental health challenges, including active listening and emotional support.
author: AMH Team

title: The Benefits of Mindfulness
description: Explore how mindfulness can enhance your daily life, reduce stress, and promote emotional regulation.
author: Dr. Sarah Khan

title: How Social Media Impacts Mental Health
description: Analyze the positive and negative impacts of social media on mental well-being and strategies to balance its usage.
author: AMH Research Team

title: Understanding Burnout and How to Prevent It
description: Learn about the causes of burnout, its symptoms, and actionable tips to prevent and recover from it.
author: Dr. Adeel Ahmed

title: The Loneliness Epidemic: How to Cope
description: Explore why loneliness is a growing concern and actionable steps to build social connections and combat isolation.
author: AMH Team

title: Nature Therapy: The Healing Power of the Outdoors
description: Understand how spending time in nature can reduce stress, improve mood, and boost overall mental health.
author: Dr. Hiba Farooq
